thread.title: J.Crew Holdouts Stumble in Debt-Exchange Lawsuit

author: Andrew Scurria
title: J.Crew Holdouts Stumble in Debt-Exchange Lawsuit
text:
A New York judge handed J. Crew Group Inc. a partial victory against lenders challenging a debt swap that swung assets to other creditors and alarmed high-yield debt markets.
The decision issued Wednesday by Judge Shirley Werner Kornreich in New York state court narrowed a lawsuit brought by lenders Eaton Vance Management and Highland Capital Management LP, which had balked at last year’s debt exchange that tapped the value of J. Crew’s brand name to avert a potential bankruptcy.
...
